class.name: breder.lang.String
class.desc: This is a classe that represent the String of a code.

method.name: length
method.desc: This method will return the length of a String.

class.name: breder.lang.Number
class.desc: This is a classe that represent the Number not integer of a code.

method.desc: This method will return if the number equal with other.
